publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5980Stuart McMillan:Congratulations to St John’s Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates St John’s Primary, Port Glasgow, on winning the Inverclyde heat of the Euroquiz competition; further congratulates all teams that competed in this heat on the high level of competition and enthusiasm displayed throughout; notes that the final of the Euroquiz takes place on Monday 10 May in the Scottish Parliament, and wishes St John’s Primary the best of luck in the final. Supported by: Bill Wilson*, Aileen Campbell*, Stewart Maxwell*, Gil Paterson*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-5980 Congratulations to St John’s Primary School (lodged on 17 March 2010) Anne McLaughlin*, Sandra White*
